thread.title: Live Score: India vs England, 1st T20I
thread.title_full: Live Score: India vs England, 1st T20I

title: Live Score: India vs England, 1st T20I
text: Captain Virat Kohli walks in to open the batting with KL Rahul 04:04 PM (IST) England captain Eoin Morgan has won the toss and opted to bowl against India in the first T20I which will be the first for Virat Kohli as captain and also the first ever in Kanpur 1.4 OVERS India: 11/0 C Jordan to V Kohli, Wide. 1.3 OVERS India: 10/0 C Jordan to V Kohli, No run. 1.2 OVERS India: 10/0 C Jordan to V Kohli, No run. Free Hit coming up! 1.1 OVERS India: 10/0 C Jordan to V Kohli, NO BALL! Fullish delivery outside off, Virat looks to drive it on the up through point. Times it nicely but Roy present there gets to his right and cuts it out. However, Jordan has overstepped and it's a massive one. Not the start Jordan would have hoped for! CHRIS JORDAN to bowl from the other end. 0.6 OVERS India: 9/0 T Mills to L Rahul, FOUR! Takes the aerial route! Short and width on offer, Rahul cuts it over backward point and the ball races to the fence. 10 runs off the over! 0.5 OVERS India: 5/0 T Mills to L Rahul, Angling away from Rahul, left alone. 0.4 OVERS India: 5/0 T Mills to V Kohli, On the pads, tucked on the leg side for a single. 0.3 OVERS India: 4/0 T Mills to V Kohli, FOUR! Back of a length outside off, angling across, VK punches it through cover-point. Gets off the mark with a boundary! 0.2 OVERS India: 0/0 T Mills to V Kohli, Angling towards the pads, Kohli misses his flick and gets rapped up on the thigh pad. 0.1 OVERS India: 0/0 T Mills to V Kohli, Back of a length delivery, angling away, Kohli gets on hi toes and defends it on the off side. The national anthems of both the teams are done and dusted. LOKESH RAHUL and VIRAT KOHLI to open for India. TYMAL MILLS to start the proceedings with the ball. It's a packed crowd out there, set for an entertaining one. Let's play... Lokesh Rahul, Manish Pandey, Virat Kohli(c), Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, MS Dhoni(w), Hardik Pandya, Parvez Rasool, Yuzvendra Chahal, Jasprit Bumrah, Ashish Nehra. Jason Roy, Sam Billings, Joe Root, Eoin Morgan(c), Ben Stokes, Jos Buttler(w), Moeen Ali, Chris Jordan, Liam Plunkett, Adil Rashid, Tymal Mills. VIRAT KOHLI says that he would have bowled first too but maintains that toss isn't something a captain can control. Hopes that his side can start well and do the basics right. Reflects on the good mix of youth and experience in the side as a good point for the team. Expects that it will be a very good batting pitch. Says that PARVEZ RASOOL is making his debut. Mandeep Singh, Amit Mishra, Ajinkya Rahane and Rishabh Pant are the ones missing out. EOIN MORGAN says that England will bowl. Feels that the win in the final ODI series was a confidence booster and adds that it was a hardly fought duel there. Hopes that his side can keep up the winning momentum in this series as well. Feels that it is tough to predict a par score and maintains that it is a good pitch. Jake Ball, Jonny Bairstow, David Willey (injury) and Liam Dawson are the ones missing out for England. Time for the toss. Kohli flips the coin, heads is the call from Morgan and it is a head. ENGLAND WIN THE TOSS AND OPT TO BOWL. Hello and a warm welcome to the first T20I between India and England at the Green Park, Kanpur on India's 68th Republic Day. After winning both the Test and the ODI series, India would look upon winning the T20I series as well. They have a strong squad and are the favourites to win. Morgan and co. on the other hand would be coming into this match with gaining some momentum after their win in the previous ODI. It's aiming to be a great contest between bat and ball and surely an entertaining one! From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
